alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 10:18PM MST until January 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Storm total snow of 6 to 12 inches through with locally higher amounts up to 24 inches in the Park City and Heber City areas. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Periods of winter driving conditions will occur. The heavy, wet snow has the potential to cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
